short_summary: Training on methods of Fresh Whole Blood collection and complications and whole blood donation eligibility screening and testing.
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for a National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for a whole blood training and screening services for Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) members. This services includes training on methods of fresh whole blood collection, potential complications, and whole blood donation eligibility screening and testing.
full_summary: **Whole Blood Training and Screening Services** **Official Title - English:** Whole Blood Training and Screening Services **Title - French:** Services de formation et d’évaluation du sang total **Reference:** * Reference number: CB-22-10215347 * Amendment number: 5 * Solicitation number: W6369-24-A016 **Contract Details:** * Tender type: Advance Contract Award Notice * Procurement category: SRV * Contracting entity: Department of National Defence * Contracting entity address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada * Contract contact: Marie-Diane Payeur * Email: * Language(s) of tender: English and French **Tender Details:** * Tender description: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires training services on whole blood collection and donation eligibility screening and testing for deploying Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) members on expeditionary operations. * Tender closing date: 2023-11-17T16:00:00 * Notice URL: None * Attachment: Please see the tender notice at (English) and (French) **Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to the following trade agreements: * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement * North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) * World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) * Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) * Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA) * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) [1]
